title: Dino Survival: 3D Simulator
description: Survive in this prehistoric Jurassic park. Tame and grow dinosaurs, fight dinos, explore uncharted territories and incredible areas. Build your settlement. Sail to distant islands. Go to Raid! Conquer! Defeat raptors and the huge T-Rex!
instructions: Control: For PC. Character control - "WASD", Arrow keys or hold down the left mouse button and drag the mouse in the desired direction. Attack - the hero attacks automatically. For Mobile devices. Character control - press your finger on the screen and drag your finger in the desired direction. Attack - the hero attacks automatically.

title: Obby Draw to Escape
description: Have a blast in Obby illustrating your way to victory! Play the fun and relaxing casual game Draw to Escape and see if you can overcome the levels' issues using just your creativity. You may earn money as you go through the levels, and you can earn even more coins when you reach the end of each level for every star you find. Things may vanish or explode and kill you, so be sure to check every level thoroughly.
instructions: Instructions: Draw with your pencil the platforms on which you can walk and avoid the dangerous obstacles in the levels. Collect coins so you can buy new skins for your character. Controls: Use the mouse to draw A Move left D Move right Spacebar to make a small jump Use the game buttons to erase what you have drawn.

title: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion
description: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion is an action-packed horde survival game where you soar through the skies on a magical broom, battling waves of enemies! Defeat foes and gather experience points to level up and grow stronger. Unlock and master powerful spells, evolving them to take down enemies even faster. Good luck in your battles!
instructions: PC Controls WASD or Arrows = movement Space = broom leap / rush Z = choose to take the first spell X = choose to take the second spell C = choose to take the third spell Mobile Controls Joystick = movement Rush Button = leap/ rush

title: THE SURVEY
description: After a long work time when you ready to play games in your computer and start a survey and it's shows you the things that you don't want to watch and know! - 5-10 min Gameplay - Atmospheric Enveronment - Intrective Gameplay
instructions: MOUSE for everything

title: Triangle Way
description: Soar into action with Triangle Way, a thrilling neon-themed arcade adventure where you pilot a small neon plane through a maze of dangers. Guide your plane safely through hazardous territory, avoiding enemies and obstacles at every turn. With fast-paced gameplay and escalating challenges, this game will test your reflexes and quick thinking. Experience vivid neon graphics, smooth controls, and heart-pounding action as you dodge threats and aim for high scores.
instructions: Mobile: touch, hold and move left or right Desktop: click or use any keys to start. Just move cursor or Use Left or Right keys

title: Halloween Challenge
description: Get ready for a spooky adventure in Halloween Challenge! Bats are flying through the night, carrying candy that you must protect. Your mission? Tap the bats before they escape with the sweet treats. But beware, if even one bat escapes, the game is over! With simple controls and addictive gameplay, Halloween Challenge offers a fun and fast-paced experience for players. Test your reflexes, compete for high scores, and enjoy the eerie Halloween atmosphere. How long can you defend the candy?
instructions: Tap the bats before they escape with the sweet treats. But beware, if even one bat escapes, the game is over!

title: Noob Draw Punch
description: Play this fascinating game and enjoy yourself. The Imperfect Punch Enjoy yourself as you sketch out the path of your character's punch. Assist the rookie player in surviving the onslaught of monsters (such as huggy, kissy missy, catnap, and more) that they encounter throughout the game. Luckily, you'll have a strong fist that can track the monsters, so you can assist the young newbie escape alive from this trap. He's afraid when he meets all the creatures in Poppy Playtime.
instructions: Instructions: Look carefully at the position of the monsters in each level and the objects that you can use to eliminate them touch the character's fist and draw the trajectory of the punch to hit the monsters. You will have 3 possibilities try not to fail or you will lose the level. Controls: Use the mouse to draw the trajectory of the fist. On mobile devices, tap and drag to draw the path of your fist.

title: Run 3D
description: The infinite running platformer game Run 3D takes place in the immensity of space. The character must be navigated by players through the constantly shifting space. Go, leap, and keep yourself from plummeting into the chasm!

title: King of Crabs
description: Easy to operate the krab,The Shell Gallery will show each role's armor, speed, skill, and pelt,The Equipment shop sells 5 Claws, 5 Bodies, and 5 Legs, Claim extra claw coins in the Sign and Spin,The Quick Match will make a fight with 24 players.The Ultimate Guide to Winning Tactics and Tips,Find a shell first. title: Cool Man

Don't forget to collect key along the way! The game has 10 levels for you to explore, so there's plenty of adventure to be had.

title: Stickman Fight Pro
description: Stickman Fight Pro is an action-packed, fast-paced fighting game featuring simple yet intense gameplay. Players control a stickman character in a variety of challenging arenas, engaging in battles against other stickmen or AI opponents. The game emphasizes quick reflexes, strategic moves, and a variety of weapons and power-ups to outmaneuver and defeat enemies.

description: Defeat other stick figures and show the world who's the finest archer in Stickman Archer Online, an action game. Delve into the realm of stick figures and unearth their secret meanings. Arm yourself with better bows, arrows, quivers, and shields. Learn new talents and unlock new effects to unlock more arrows. Add personality to your stickman by letting him wear a variety of caps, masks, hairdos, beards, and animations. Add more stickers to the stickman flag collection.

title: West Frontier Sharpshooter 3D
description: Have you ever dreamed of being a cowboy in a world like A Fistful of Dollars? Then this game is made for you! This is a Western-style sniper game, take your Winchester Model 1894 to kill all the bandits, and bring justice to this land! Carefully plan the order of killing and don't let the covering fire kill you! Sometimes head-on confrontations are inevitable, all the bandits are firing, but you are ready for this, show them the power of your M1873!

title: Draw To Home 3D
description: Draw to home is a game to draw lines home. Everyone needs to return home according to their respective homes. This type of puzzle game is full of adventure with avoiding traps and obstacles on the way to finding a house. Play a game of drawing a line to get home. It is very fun for children or teenagers to fill their days with this fun game.
instructions: - Touch people and draw a line to the house - Draw a line towards the house according to the color of the person

title: Super Bitcoin Boy
description: “Super Bitcoin Boy” is a “Mario Bros” style platform game, themed around the Bitcoin cryptocurrency, eliminate enemies, overcome obstacles, collect all the bitcoins to get the highest score possible. Enjoy the Halving year, have fun playing and complete all levels.
instructions: On the computer, use the "AWSD" arrow keys to move. On mobile, use the arrow keys on the screen to move.

title: Transformers Battle For The City
description: In this game you will find an open world where you will defend the city from the invasion of robots. If you are a fan of transformers, then you will definitely like this game. In the game you will find 7 full-fledged story tasks, the complexity of which will gradually increase. After receiving the task, you will go to the place of military operations, where you can use various super-techniques to destroy powerful robot villains.
instructions: Control in the game. The car: WASD-Movement. Space bar - Brake. Left mouse button - shooting with machine guns. T - Transformation into a robot. Esc - Pause. Robot: WASD-Movement. Left Shift - Running. Left mouse button - Easy attack. Right mouse button - Medium attack. Middle mouse button - Heavy attack. T - Transformation to a car. Esc - Pause.

title: Obby Climb Racing
description: In the adventure game Obby Climb Racing, players may spend a lot of time racing on insane roads, acquiring interesting skins, improving Obby's bike, and completing difficult parkour courses. For fans of fast-paced, skill-based games, this is a must-play because of the thrilling combination of racing, platforming, and character advancement. In this adrenaline-pumping game, you'll have to crank your engines, level up your character, and complete parkour tasks.
instructions: Instructions: Drive your bike around the circuit accelerating and braking to reach the track of each level. Collect as many coins as you can to be able to buy a new skin. Controls W = Accelerate S = Break Arrows = Rotate Spacebar Jump

title: Dynamons 9
description: Embark on a brand new Dynamons adventure in Dynamons 9! This online monster collecting game includes two fresh areas to explore; Halloween world and the bonus cave. Encounter Tholanyx, Scarykin, Anubolt, Sauryx in frankenstein skin, Zonysus in Dracula skin and many more special Dynamons. Recruit them for your team and beat others in thrilling 1v1 battles with special attacks and power-ups.
instructions: Play the game using touchscreen controls or your mouse. The game consists of spellbinding turn-based battles. You can use the action cards to attack, and catch the opposing creature when it’s weakened. The backpack is filled with items you can collect and use during your journeys. By selecting it during battle, you can access these special items. Use shards to level up your Dynamons, and to gain new action cards. Challenge other trainers and become the strongest Dynamon Captain!

title: Epic Hero Quest Idle RPG
description: Conquer enemies, level up heroes, unlock skills in Epic Hero Quest: Idle RPG! - Battle Through Hordes of Enemies - Earn Gold and Level Up - Unlock and Upgrade Skills Are you ready to embark on the ultimate adventure? Join the quest and become the legendary hero you were destined to be in Epic Hero Quest: Idle RPG!
instructions: Enhance your hero and skills

title: Paperly - Paper Plane Adventure
description: Go on an exciting paper plane flight adventure, learn different flight mechanics & reach your destination. PAPERLY: PAPER PLANE ADVENTURE - is all about Flying a Paper Plane, learning from previous mistakes, and Heading toward a Better Flight in this Physics-Driven Gameplay.
instructions: For PC - 'WASD' & 'Shift' for Movements and Boost For Mobile - Joystick & Buttons

title: Portals
description: Portals - HTML5 adventure-puzzle game where two heroes, one black and one white, are stranded on a mysterious planet filled with portals after being swallowed by a black hole. Your mission is to guide them through a series of challenging levels, utilizing their unique abilities to navigate this portal-filled world and find their way home. With intriguing puzzles, captivating graphics, and an immersive storyline, Portals offers a thrilling gaming experience for players of all ages.
instructions: Desktop: - Use Left, Right, Up (for jump) Arrows and Space (for switch player) Mobile: - Just touch buttons Left, Right, Jump, Switsh on the screen To complete the level, each hero must reach the portal of their corresponding color.

title: Neko's Adventure
description: Neko’s Adventure is a vibrant platformer starring Neko, a playful cat trying to rescue his girlfriend. Explore 20 challenging levels, unlock the Power Beam to shoot fire, and face quirky enemies in a whimsical, fast-paced adventure full of charm, excitement, and cartoon fun!
instructions: Desktop Left\Right keys - move Up key - jump Spacebar - shoots fire Mobile - Touch screen buttons

title: GMOD Bombs
description: Experience the power of a high-tech laser cannon in the GMOD Bombs! Collect bombs, create cities, and aim to destroy objects on the map and enjoy spectacular explosions. GMOD Bombs is an exciting game where you take on the role of a bombardier armed with a futuristic laser cannon. Your task is to collect bombs and strategically destroy various objects and structures on the map. Each bomb has a unique flight trajectory and blast radius, which requires precision and aiming skills.
instructions: Game mode. WASD - Move. E - Activate the bomb. I - Store. Right mouse button - Shoot. Left mouse button - Capture an object with a laser. Esc - Pause. Construction Mode. WASD - Control the camera. Right mouse button - Browse. Left mouse button - Select. Wheel - Rotate the object during installation. C - Clear the location. T - Open / Close the panel for adding points. B - Switch to spawn mode.

title: Skibronx Runner
description: Make your way through the streets in this endless runner game while you encounter various challenges. In the level mode its your goal to reach the grocery store without losing. In the endless mode your goal is to reach as far as possible without losing.
instructions: Up Arrow Key = jump 2x Up Arrow Key = double jump Holding Up Arrow Key after double jump = fly Arrow down = Sliding E = shoot watergun or bumping

title: Hill Climb Truck Transform Adventure
description: Hill Climb: Truck Transform Adventure is actually a 2D balance stunt adventure game. You have 3 kinds of vehicles to transform and overpass different terrains. While keeping the vehicle balanced, you can climb different ramps and terrains. If you crash obstacles or terrains, you can collect repair plates to recover. If you want to overpass the next harder levels, you can upgrade your vehicles with 4 acceleration abilities.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Save my Hero
description: Players may enjoy a unique gaming experience in Save my Hero Online, an engaging puzzle game that revolves on drawing lines. You take on the role of a superhero under assault from missiles in the game. It is your responsibility to create lines to stop these projectiles and shield the hero. Finish every level and attempt to rescue the superheroes, such as Iron Man, Batman, Spider-Man, and so on.
instructions: Instructions: Draw the protective shield for the different heroes from the rockets that will be fired by the drones. Controls: Draw with the mouse or touch and slide on mobile devices.

title: Kawaii Realm Adventure
description: Embark on a whimsical journey to the "Kawaii Realm" with Sarah, Emma, Lily, and Mia! Discover a hidden portal in their school basement, transforming them into adorable 2D characters. Engage in dress-up and makeup activities for a delightful adventure!
instructions: Select a character, dress up, and do makeup. Enjoy exploring the charming Kawaii Realm!

title: Maze Escape : Craft Man
description: Objective: Navigate through a series of craft doors and escape the maze without being killed by terrifying entities. Gameplay: Explore the Maze: Move through a maze filled with multiple doors, each leading to new and more challenging areas. Survive the Entities: Avoid or outsmart various entities that lurk in the maze, each with unique behaviors and attack patterns. Find the Next Door: Continuously search for the next door to progress to subsequent levels of the maze. Collect Items: Gather keys to unlock doors, coins for upgrades, and useful tools to aid in your survival.
instructions: keyboard and pouse

title: Pirate Noob Apocalypse
description: It's time to enjoy yourself with this Pirate Noob Apocalypse game. A little pirate noob is getting ready to go out and battle many zombies that have arisen to take over the planet and all seafaring vessels. You may have a great time playing this engaging action and shooting game and rising to the position of the greatest pirate around.
instructions: Instructions: Aim at all the enemies that will crawl to your ship with the goal of becoming an undead. Improve your ship by buying upgrades with the coins you get. Controls Use the mouse to play or touch the screen on touch devices.

title: Fall Bean 2
description: Fall Bean 2 invites you to a colorful, fun-filled world of races! In this chaotic platform game, your goal is to be the last one standing by outmaneuvering other players. Jump, roll, and leave your opponents behind on challenging courses. Overcome new obstacles in each round to reach the final and claim victory! Compete with friends or players from around the world in non-stop action. Join Fall Bean 2 now and enjoy the excitement!
instructions: Objective: The goal of Fall Bean 2 is to survive each round and be the last player standing. Navigate through obstacle courses and avoid elimination. Move: Use the arrow keys or WASD to move your character. Jump: Press the spacebar to jump over obstacles. Dive: Press the shift key while in the air to dive forward. Grab: Use the left mouse button or the E key to grab objects or other players.

title: Cute Rabbit's Challenging Adventure
description: Accompany the cute rabbit's adventure together and have fun. I think it will be a little difficult to progress on the challenging tracks consisting of 5 sections in total. Avoid dangers and destroy enemies. Overcome obstacles and have fun times.
instructions: Arrow keys on the keyboard, screen keys on mobile devices

title: Dog Escape
description: Dog Escape is the best dog simulation game with twists and turns that will keep you busy for hours. Whether you're a dog or cat lover, this game is perfect for everyone. Each level is a maze of challenging obstacles, security guards and rooms full of traps. The game becomes more challenging as you progress to higher levels.
instructions: Swipe mouse & finger. Unlike other dog games, there are no cats around to bother you, but you will find many power-ups and hiding spots, such as: -Hiding Spots: Take a break from the guards and hide in a closet, the perfect place to avoid detection until you're ready to continue your adventure. -Dog Treats: If you come across a cookie, eat it. They are delicious. -Buttons: Press buttons to eliminate electric traps or remove obstacles that prevent your dog from escaping.

title: Underwater Survival Deep Dive
description: This is an underwater adventure game set on an alien ocean planet. You'll encounter a vast open world filled with wonders and dangers! Survival in this alien oceanic world demands quick thinking and resourcefulness. Your ship is your raft.
instructions: WASD - movement control, spacebar - dive/surface, shift - accelerate, F - turn on/off the flashlight, Q - use a stun gun. To rotate the camera, hold down the left mouse button.

title: Magic Solitaire
description: Welcome to the amazing magical world of solitaire! Here you can make yourself at home, playing layouts on a tavern table by the fireside, or in the shade of an oak tree by a majestic rushing waterfall. Your fairy helper will guide you through this magical world full of mystery and ancient secrets. Magic World Solitaire is the classic solitaire you love in an exciting new world.
instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

title: Stickman Prison Escape
description: Stickman went back to prison for committing a minor crime. It's time to find a successful way to escape from this cold, gray prison. Guards and other difficulties await you along the way. There will be a choice of 3 items that the guard brought hidden in the pumpkin. It's Halloween time and pumpkin will help Stickman successfully escape prison.
instructions: To control the game, use a computer mouse. If you have a mobile device, use a stylus or finger. To complete the game, you need to click on different objects and find a way to run away from prison.

title: Blackriver Mystery. Hidden Objects
description: "Blackriver: Search for objects" is a new game in which you have to try on the role of a mystical detective, the one who is destined to restore the town from the ruins and solve its mystery. Here you will find a lot of interesting quests, unique collections, popular mini-games (such as three-in-a-row, wheel of fortune and others).
instructions: The goal of the game: complete the entire game, consisting of quests, mini-games and an unforgettable plot. PC control: Left mouse button Control on a mobile device: touch

title: Simon Super Rabbit
description: Simon and his friends have turned into superheroes and now they must look for the evil Professor Wolf and get their marbles back. Grrr… That boastful and braggart Professor Wolf and his minions don’t want to give the marbles back to Simon and they have challenged him to a super mega competition which he must win to get them back. If you beat him, he will be giving the marbles back to you. Surely you can win and get them all back. Go for it!
instructions: Help Simon, Gaspard, Lou and Ferdinand beat Professor Wolf in 3 amazing events which only a superhero can win… but be careful with the cheater Professor Wolf!

title: Hex Planet Idle
description: Hex Planet Idle is both an RPG adventure game and a survival idle game with 3D models. You can control a stickman warrior to discover the whole universe by collecting resources and unlocking new areas. When you step on the white lighting areas, you will know the resource request of the next area. Get close to any items to collect them automatically. If I were you, I would unlock all areas because of the plentiful resources.

title: Indygirl and the Golden Skull
description: The girl who loves to uncover hidden treasures and adventures. She now found the Golden Skull and now ready come and needs your help dig into the cave! Your task is help Indygirl in her journey to collect all the jewels and golds that are hidden in the cave. Focus on getting gold! Run as fast as you can before that gigantic rock will run over you!
instructions: Save yourself from the Skull.

title: CraftsMan 3D Gangster
description: In the new action game CraftsMan 3D Gangster, which is exciting and similar to Minecraft, you may become a real-life gangster roaming the streets of the city. As you explore the open world, you'll encounter other criminals who are eager to wipe you off the map. Get through every level of this fun 3D action game, where you'll face more frightening adversaries.
instructions: Instructions: Try to survive all the enemies, run through the city looking for the objectives before they eliminate you, aim and shoot all the enemies in your path. Controls: Mouse To Look W A S D To Drive Space To Hand Break F To Exit Vehicle

title: Idle Archer Tower Defense RPG
description: Welcome brave archer heroes to the enchanting realm of Idle Archer Tower Defense RPG! Embrace the role of a solitary archer, unyielding in defending their towering stronghold against relentless tides of monstrous adversaries. With an unwavering determination, you pledge to safeguard the realm from the nefarious creatures summoned by the sinister dark Lord. Engage in a battle to fortify your tower, enhance the skill set of your valiant archers, and triumph over malicious waves of malevolence.

title: Hide and Escape from Angry Teacher
description: Dive into the atmosphere of escape with hide and seek in this free online 3d game! Help the hero to escape school! Hide and interact with objects to avoid being seen by the teachers. Get to the school bus by any means necessary to escape!
instructions: Your main task is to get out of the school and not let the evil teacher catch you. You can interact with some items(hide, pick up, activate, etc). Control character: - On the desktop. Press the WASD keys or move the mouse with the left button pressed. - On mobile. Move your finger across the screen.

title: Golden Frontier
description: This simulation game takes you on a Wild West adventure. Mine and manage resources, grow crops and craft goods as you aim to build a thriving city in the frontier lands. Invite friends to become your neighbors to trade and co-op, and progress quicker. Hunt for gold, unlock new locations, and discover secrets as the story unfolds. Meet a colorful cast of characters, including trappers, Indians and criminals.
instructions: Mouse controls. Play full screen for better user experience.

title: Square World 3D
description: Square World 3D invites you into a completely open and huge craft world. In this world, you can use dozens of items / mines to design most of the things you can imagine and take actions in a world of your own. For example, first design, then fly over your unique design using the flying mode! This wonderful simulation game may become addictive for you. It is possible to design a completely different world in every game.
instructions: MOVE: "W,A,S,D" RUN: "LEFT SHIFT" OPEN THE BLOCKS PANEL: "Q" CHANGE THE BLOCKS ROW: "TAB" SELECT BLOCKS:"1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8" HIT BLOCK: "Mouse Left-Click" ROTATE BLOCK: "R" PLACE BRICK: "X" CREATE BLOCK: "Mouse Right-Click" INTERACT: "T" THROW: "G" PAUSE: “ESC” MUSIC ON / OFF: "O"

title: Backrooms Among Impostor & Rolling Giant
description: Now you must escape from Impostor Among Us and Rolling giant. But beware granny sometimes accidentally appear to haunt you! Grab all phone before time run out and call your friend to help you!
instructions: WASD - Move Mouse move - camera Space - Grab item Shift - run

title: Huggy Wuggy Escape
description: Huggy Wuggy Escape is a Poppy Playtime inspired fangame where you have to do 4 simple things in order to win: Find a gun, find some bullets, shoot down Huggy Wuggy and leave the factory before it explode. To kill Huggy you have to shoot him at least six times, but the bullets are rare, so you have to move around the complex looking for them. If Huggy catch you is game over. Once you shot him down, you have to reach the exit in less than 30 seconds.
instructions: WSEQ To move Up, down,left and right AD to Turn left and right Space or X to shoot

title: Last Day On Earth Survival
description: Last Day on Earth: Survival is a 2D survival simulation game. In this large ruined city, you have 51 locations to discover. When you collect some wood and metal, you can make weapons on the Workbench. When you win enough experience and level up, you can check your Attribute and upgrade HP, ATK, Speed, and Search. In the day, explore and go to places you have never visited. I hope you will survive 50 days and explore all 51 locations.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play
